Bash(PYTHONIOENCODING=utf-8 python -c "
import PyPDF2, os, sys

pdf_dir = None
for d in os.listdir\(r''C:\\git\\technological_foods''\):
    full = os.path.join\(r''C:\\git\\technological_foods'', d\)
    if os.path.isdir\(full\) and ''Documenta'' in d:
        pdf_dir = full
        break

if not pdf_dir:
    print\(''PDF dir not found''\)
    sys.exit\(1\)

for fname in sorted\(os.listdir\(pdf_dir\)\):
    if fname.endswith\(''.pdf''\):
        fpath = os.path.join\(pdf_dir, fname\)
        reader = PyPDF2.PdfReader\(fpath\)
        print\(f''=== {fname} \({len\(reader.pages\)} pages\) ===''\)
        for i, page in enumerate\(reader.pages\):
            text = page.extract_text\(\)
            if text:
                print\(f''--- Page {i+1} ---''\)
                clean = text.encode\(''ascii'', ''replace''\).decode\(''ascii''\)
                print\(clean[:2000]\)
        print\(\)
")
